dataItem.label: Organization/Matter Name
dataItem.name: Organization/Matter Name
dataItem.expression: case ?Invoice By Report? when 'Organization/Matter' then ([Organization Name] + '/' + [Matter Name] ) else ([Matter Name]+'/' + [Organization Name] ) end

dataItem.label: Net Amount
dataItem.name: Net Amount
dataItem.expression: [Business View].[W_INVOICE_LEVEL_SUMMARY].[User Total Net amount Post tax Amount]

dataItem.name: Invoiced
dataItem.expression: [Business View].[W_INVOICE_LEVEL_SUMMARY].[User Total Gross Amount]+[Business View].[W_INVOICE_LEVEL_SUMMARY].[User Total Submitted Adjustments Amount]

dataItem.name: Adjustments
dataItem.expression: [Business View].[W_INVOICE_LEVEL_SUMMARY].[User Total Net Adjustment Amount Savings Amount]-[Business View].[W_INVOICE_LEVEL_SUMMARY].[User Total Submitted Adjustments Amount]

detailFilter.filterExpression: case when (?Date Type? = 'Fiscal Date' ) then ([Business View].[W_INVOICE_LEVEL_SUMMARY].[FISCAL_DATE] in_range ?Invoice Fiscal Date?) else ([Business View].[W_INVOICE_LEVEL_SUMMARY].[INVOICE_DATE] in_range ?Invoice Fiscal Date?) end
[Business View].[Matter Person].[Role Involvement Code] = 'Primary Internal Contact'

dataSource.reportExpression:
IF ((substring(ReportPath(),position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())+14,position("]/report[@name",ReportPath())-position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())-15)+'-'+ReportName()) contains "folder[@name=") OR ((substring(ReportPath(),position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())+14,position("]/reportView[@name",ReportPath())-position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())-15)+'-'+ReportName()) contains "folder[@name=") THEN (ReportName()) ELSE ( IF (ReportPath() contains "reportView") THEN (substring(ReportPath(),position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())+14,position("]/reportView[@name",ReportPath())-position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())-15)+'-'+ReportName())
ELSE (substring(ReportPath(),position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())+14,position("]/report[@name",ReportPath())-position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())-15)+'-'+ReportName()) )

IF ((substring(ReportPath(),position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())+14,position("]/report[@name",ReportPath())-position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())-15)+'-'+ReportName()) contains "folder[@name=") OR ((substring(ReportPath(),position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())+14,position("]/reportView[@name",ReportPath())-position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())-15)+'-'+ReportName()) contains "folder[@name=") THEN (ReportName()) ELSE ( IF (ReportPath() contains "reportView") THEN (substring(ReportPath(),position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())+14,position("]/reportView[@name",ReportPath())-position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())-15)+'-'+ReportName())
ELSE (substring(ReportPath(),position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())+14,position("]/report[@name",ReportPath())-position("folder[@name=",ReportPath())-15)+'-'+ReportName()) )

dataSource.staticValue:
<script>
StartHidden("ReportByTable",1,0);
StartHidden("DateTable",2,0);
StartHidden("PABUTable",3,1);
StartHidden("MatterTable",4,1);
StartHidden("PICTable",5,1);
StartHidden("OrganizationTable",6,1);
StartHidden("InvoiceTable",7,0);
setLocationHash();
</script>
